Package org.vaadin.addons.criteriacore

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCriteriaQueryDefinition<T>
    Definition of a JPA 2.0 Criteria Query.
    FilterRestriction
    Define simple restrictions to be added to the WHERE clause Useful because we cannot defined JPA2.0 Expressions independently of an EntityManager.
    LoggerUtils
    Log an exception trace to the log file.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FilterRestriction.Operation
    List of supported operators Operators GE, GT, LE and LT work on both numbers and strings.
